title: The Wasted years
creator_credit: United Nations, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Pierre des Bonnet
brief_description: This film is a comparative study of the current trend of penal system philosophy in three European countries - Austria, Hungary and Denmark. All three are in the process of re-evaluating their approach to the treatment of their offenders. No endorsement is given to any approach
